channel.title: Homes on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Academic

item.description: Biography I am currently employed as a postdoctoral researcher at DTU Compute in the Image Analysis and Computer Graphics group. I currently focus my research on Geometric Deep Learning (gdl Journal Club). In my PhD I focused primarily on methods and applications in the domain of statistical learning. My PhD thesis is titled Sparse Classification - Methods and Applications. The summer of 2018 I will be staying at deCODE genetics in Reykjavik Iceland.
